p: Antioxidants compounds can prevent disorders and diseases caused by free radicals, stabilizing them. In recent years, the interest in replacing synthetic antioxidants with aromatic and medicinal plants has been growing. The following methods have evaluated the antioxidant activity of Psidium essential oils, DPPH, ABTS, linoleic acid oxidation, XO, OH, NO, ORAC, FRAP, deoxyribose degradation, and MDA [ 105].
